entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then becoming east 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to a few flurries near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
